references.paper_title: "this is my unicorn, fluffy": Personalizing frozen vision-language representations
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of Personalized Vision and Language, a novel area explored in the survey, and proposes new metrics for evaluating personalized models.

references.paper_title: Multimodal persona-based generation of comic dialogs
references.reason: This work is one of the few to address personalized multimodal dialog generation, a significant aspect of personalized MLLMs.

references.paper_title: ConCon-Chi: Concept-context chimera benchmark for personalized vision-language tasks
references.reason: This paper introduces a benchmark dataset and metrics for evaluating personalized vision-language models, which is essential for the advancement of the field.

references.paper_title: When large language models meet personalization: Perspectives of challenges and opportunities
references.reason: This work provides a comprehensive overview of the challenges and opportunities in personalized large language models, directly relating to the topic of the survey.

references.paper_title: Commit: Coordinated instruction tuning for multimodal large language models
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel technique called Coordinated Instruction Tuning, directly relevant to the personalization methods discussed in the survey.
